|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ThirdwebProvider](./react.thirdwebprovider.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Gives access to the ThirdwebSDK instance and other useful hooks to the rest of the app. Requires to be wrapped with a ConnectionProvider and a WalletProvider from @<!-- -->solana/wallet-adapter-react. |
